metadata.title: STE-SCPB | Agricultural Commodities Trading
metadata.description: STE-SCPB - Cameroonian company specialized in agricultural commodities and raw materials trading: cocoa, coffee, wood, corn and more.

home.title: STE-SCPB | Agricultural Commodities and Raw Materials Trading
home.description: STE-SCPB, your trusted partner for agricultural commodities trading from Africa. Cocoa, coffee, wood, corn - Export to USA, Europe, Asia.

products.title: Our Products | Cocoa, Coffee, Wood, Corn | STE-SCPB
products.description: Discover our range of quality agricultural products: cocoa, coffee, wood, corn, rubber, sesame. Rainforest Alliance, UTZ certifications.

team.title: Our Team | Agricultural Trade Experts | STE-SCPB
team.description: Meet the STE-SCPB team: passionate experts with over 20 years of experience in agricultural commodities trading.

news.title: News | Agricultural Market and Export | STE-SCPB
news.description: Stay informed about the latest agricultural market news, export trends and STE-SCPB updates.

contact.title: Contact Us | STE-SCPB
contact.description: Contact STE-SCPB for your agricultural product needs. Our team responds within 24-48h. Douala-Akwa, Cameroon.

rfq.description: Get a personalized quote for your agricultural product needs. Incoterms, quantities, certifications - Response within 24-48h.

home.title: Fine Cameroon Cocoa
home.description: We supply fine terroir cocoa from Cameroon, carefully fermented and dried, ideal for demanding chocolatiers and manufacturers.

keyPoints.process: Controlled fermentation ‚Äì Natural drying ‚Äì Rigorous sorting
keyPoints.target: Supplier for artisan chocolatiers and manufacturers
keyPoints.export: Export to United States, European Union, Africa
keyPoints.traceability: Complete traceability from plantation to shipment

cta.contactTitle: Ready to source your premium cocoa?
cta.contactDescription: Get a personalized export offer. Our team supports you on volumes, specs and shipping.

welcome.title: Welcome to STE-SCPB
welcome.description: The company offers sustainable, natural and value-added food products and ingredients so that consumers can enjoy healthy and gourmet products.

workforce.title: Our Workforce
workforce.description: SCPB relies on over 100 employees and field agents, present in all 10 regions of Cameroon, along with a network of 500+ partner producers. Our teams handle collection, lot traceability, quality control and export logistics, ensuring a reliable supply chain that meets international requirements.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Discover our range of quality agricultural products

productsPreview.title: Our Agricultural Products
productsPreview.subtitle: We select and export premium quality products, with particular expertise in Cameroonian cocoa.

featured.title: Premium Cocoa
featured.terroirDesc: From the terroirs of Central and Southern Cameroon, with rich and balanced aromatic profiles. Grown in humid forest zones, ideal for slow and homogeneous fermentation.

guarantees.traceability: Guaranteed traceability from plantation to export

featured.certificationsTooltip: Depending on origin, volume and partner supply chain

whyUs.title: Why choose us?
whyUs.desc: We support our clients from bean selection to export, with a single point of contact and guaranteed responsiveness.

about.title: About STE-SCPB
about.subtitle: Cameroonian exporter of premium cocoa and agricultural products, with traceability and international compliance.

meta.title: About Us | STE-SCPB
meta.description: Discover STE-SCPB, a Cameroonian company specialized in agricultural commodities trading. Over 20 years of experience, export to USA, Europe and Asia.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Connecting African producers to international markets with transparency and quality. We work hand in hand with local farmers to guarantee top-quality products while ensuring fair compensation.
mission.proof: Identified lots, rigorous quality controls, and complete export documentation (COA, phyto, origin).

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the African leader in agricultural commodities trading by establishing standards of excellence in quality, traceability and sustainability. We aspire to create an ecosystem where producers and international buyers thrive together.
vision.proof: Raising traceability and compliance standards to sustainably meet EU/USA requirements.

values.title: Our Values
values.qualityDescription: Rigorous controls at every stage to guarantee products that meet international standards.
values.qualityProof: Target moisture 7‚Äì8%, rigorous sorting, defect control per ICCO/ISO 2451.
values.transparencyDescription: Complete traceability from farm to export, with clear and honest communication.
values.transparencyProof: Lot-by-lot traceability, documents available on request.
values.sustainabilityDescription: A strong commitment to responsible agricultural practices and local community development.
values.partnershipDescription: Lasting relationships built on mutual trust with our producers and customers.

cta.title: Ready to source your agricultural products?

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: A dedicated field and export team focused on quality, traceability and delivery. A single point of contact supports you from sample request to shipment.
team.ceoQuote: At STE-SCPB, we support international buyers in sourcing premium cocoa from Cameroon. Our priority: consistent quality, lot-by-lot traceability and complete export documentation. A single point of contact follows you from sample to shipment. Let's discuss your needs.

ceo.bio: 20+ years in agro-export ‚Äì Strategic vision & international development

gm.bio: Supply chain management & field coordination ‚Äì Producer network

operations.bio: Export logistics, incoterms & documentation ‚Äì Douala/Kribi ports

export.bio: International client relations ‚Äì EU compliance & certifications

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Need information? Our team responds within 24‚Äì48h (business days).

docs.question: What documents do you provide?
docs.answer: COA (Certificate of Analysis), phytosanitary certificate, certificate of origin, packing list, Bill of Lading.

destinations.question: What destinations do you cover?
destinations.answer: Export to European Union, United States, Asia and Africa. Loading ports: Douala and Kribi.

sample.question: How to request a sample?
sample.answer: Use our quote request form and select 'Sample' as volume.

certifications.title: Quality & Compliance
certifications.subtitle: International standards to guarantee the excellence of our products
certifications.standards: Compliance: ICCO / ISO 2451 / EU requirements (MRL pesticides)
certifications.analyses: Analyses: moisture, defects, mycotoxins, pesticide residues

quality-control.name: Quality Control
quality-control.description: Rigorous testing per ICCO / ISO 2451: grading, moisture, defects, mycotoxins, pesticide residues

traceability.name: Complete Traceability
traceability.description: Each lot identified (Lot ID): production zone, harvest period, treatment register. Documents downloadable on request.

phytosanitary.name: Phytosanitary Compliance
phytosanitary.description: Phytosanitary certificate, Certificate of origin, COA (Certificate of Analysis), Packing list & Bill of Lading

sustainable.name: Sustainable Agriculture
sustainable.description: Producer training (post-harvest best practices), traceability programs, cooperative partnerships + internal audits

process.title: Our Process
process.subtitle: From bean to container, controlled quality

fermentation.name: Controlled Fermentation
fermentation.description: 6-7 days of natural fermentation to develop aromas

drying.name: Natural Drying
drying.description: Controlled solar drying for optimal moisture (7-8%)

sorting.name: Manual Sorting
sorting.description: Visual inspection: mold, breakage, foreign matter. Defect tolerance per export grade.

packaging.name: Export Packaging
packaging.description: Jute bags + PE liner / big bags ‚Äì moisture and odor protection. Ventilated container / fumigation as needed.

stats.disclaimer: Cumulative data from partner network ‚Äì 5-year average

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: STE-SCPB is committed to protecting your privacy. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use and protect your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

dataController.title: 1. Data Controller
dataController.content: STE-SCPB, a Cameroonian agricultural commodities trading company, is responsible for processing your personal data.

items.contact: Contact data: name, email, phone, company
items.rfq: Quote request data: products, quantities, incoterms, destination port
items.navigation: Navigation data: IP address, cookies (with your consent)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis
legalBasis.intro: The processing of your data is based on:

items.contract: Performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures (quote requests)

items.contact: Contact requests: 3 years after last contact

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access to your data
items.erasure: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
items.withdraw: Right to withdraw your consent at any time

rights.exercise: To exercise these rights, contact us at: privacy@ste-scpb.com

security.title: 7. Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data: HTTPS encryption, restricted access, secure servers.

transfers.title: 8. Data Transfers
transfers.content: Your data may be transferred to service providers located outside the European Union. In such cases, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place (standard contractual clauses, adequacy decision).

cookies.title: 9. Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies. You can manage your preferences via our consent banner. For more information, please see our cookie policy.

changes.title: 10. Changes
changes.content: This policy may be updated. The last update date is indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this policy or your personal data:

publisher.title: 1. Website Publisher
publisher.companyName: Company name: STE-SCPB (Soci√©t√© de Commerce de Produits de Base)

hosting.title: 2. Hosting
hosting.address: Address: 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA

intellectual.title: 3. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website (texts, images, logos, graphics, icons, sounds, software) is the exclusive property of STE-SCPB or its partners and is protected by French and international intellectual property laws.
intellectual.prohibition: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, by any means or process, is prohibited without prior written authorization from STE-SCPB.

liability.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: STE-SCPB strives to ensure the accuracy and updating of information published on this website. However, STE-SCPB cannot guarantee the accuracy, precision or completeness of the information provided.
liability.links: Hyperlinks on this website may lead to other websites. STE-SCPB disclaims any responsibility for the content of these sites.

personalData.title: 5. Personal Data
personalData.content: For any information regarding the processing of your personal data, please consult our Privacy Policy.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies
cookies.content: This website uses cookies to improve user experience and compile visit statistics. You can configure your preferences via the consent banner.

law.title: 7. Applicable Law
law.content: These legal mentions are governed by Cameroonian law. In case of dispute, Cameroonian courts shall have sole jurisdiction.

contact.title: 8. Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding these legal mentions:

meta.title: Statistics & Export Performance | STE-SCPB
meta.description: Discover our key figures: exported volumes, destinations, partner producers. Consolidated data to support your purchasing decisions.

hero.title: Statistics & Export Performance
hero.subtitle: Transparent figures to support your purchasing decisions. Consolidated data, updated monthly.

kpi.disclaimer: Indicative and consolidated data (non-contractual). For a quoted offer: request a quote.

tooltips.tonnes: Total volume exported over the last 12 months (all commodities combined)
tooltips.producers: Network of partner producers across Cameroon's 10 regions
tooltips.years: Years of experience in agricultural commodity exports
tooltips.response: Average response time to quote requests (business days)
tooltips.traced: Percentage of lots with full traceability (zone, date, cooperative)

empty.title: No data for this combination
empty.description: Try broadening your filters or select 'Global' and 'Last 12 months'.

volumes.title: Monthly volumes
volumes.seasonality: Seasonality and availability according to harvest

grading.title: Quality control
grading.description: Grading, humidity, defects per ICCO standards

traceability.title: Lot-by-lot traceability
traceability.description: Each lot identified: zone, date, cooperative

volumes.question: How do you calculate volumes?
volumes.answer: Volumes are aggregated from our actual shipments over the selected period. They include all commodities (cocoa, coffee, cashew, etc.) and are updated monthly.

update.question: How often are stats updated?
update.answer: Statistics are consolidated and updated once a month, usually at the beginning of the month for the previous month.

products.question: Which products are included in the figures?
products.answer: Global statistics include all our commodities: cocoa (beans, butter, paste, powder), coffee, cashew nuts, sesame, soybean, wood and other agricultural products.

methodology.question: What methodology is used?
methodology.answer: Data comes from our internal shipping records and logistics partners. They are consolidated and anonymized to respect our clients' confidentiality.

cta.title: Ready to import?
cta.subtitle: Our export team supports you on volumes, specs and shipping.

methodology.disclaimer: Aggregated internal data. May vary by season, availability and zones.
methodology.source: Source: STE-SCPB shipping records ‚Äì Non-contractual data.
